name: Kipo's Otherworldly Delivery
description:
You are Kipo running your Otherworldly Delivery service!

Navigate between realms (using numbers on keyboard) to find and fulfill your orders. Within the otherworldly realm, position your teleport spell over the object you want to deliver using the WASD keys. Control where objects are teleported to using IJKL keys. Cast your teleport spell with the SPACE key.

Customer's take 20 seconds to retrieve their item from the warehouse. So don't blow it up before they get it!

You have 2 minutes to get a high score.

Objects will explode on collision with each other.

Controls:
WASD: move left cursor
IJKL: move right cursor
Space: cast teleport
1,2: open window to new realm

This was made for Trijam 107 in three hours with a team of two. We made all of our own assets.
